example.parse: (IP-OBJ (IP (CP-CND (ADVP (CS 若)) (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 自己)) (VP (VC 是) (QP-PRD (CP-APP (IP (PU 「) (NP-SBJ (NN 男人)) (VP (ADVP (AD 真)) (VP (VV 命苦))) (PU 」)) (DEC 的)) (ADJP (JJ 最後)) (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 代))))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (NP (PN 他)) (NP (NN 弟弟))) (VP (ADVP (AD 恐怕)) (VP (PU 「) (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VA 老) (AS 了))) (VP (VV 会) (VP (PP (P 比) (NP (PN 自己))) (VP (VV 命苦)))) (PU 」)))))
